verses.text_plain: The burden of the valley of vision. What aileth thee now, that thou art wholly gone up to the housetops?
verses.verse_html: 1The burden of the valley of vision. What aileth thee now, that thou art wholly gone up to the housetops?

tokens.text: that thou art wholly gone up

verses.text_plain: Thou that art full of stirs, a tumultuous city, a joyous city: thy slain men are not slain with the sword, nor dead in battle.
verses.verse_html: 2Thou that art full of stirs, a tumultuous city, a joyous city: thy slain men are not slain with the sword, nor dead in battle.

verses.text_plain: All thy rulers are fled together, they are bound by the archers: all that are found in thee are bound together, which have fled from far.
verses.verse_html:
3All thy rulers are fled together, they are bound by the archers: all that are found in thee are bound together, which have fled from far. ▼
▼ by…: Heb. of the bow

footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: Heb. of the bow

verses.text_plain: Therefore said I, Look away from me; I will weep bitterly, labour not to comfort me, because of the spoiling of the daughter of my people.
verses.verse_html:
4Therefore said I, Look away from me; I will weep bitterly, labour not to comfort me, because of the spoiling of the daughter of my people. ▼
▼ weep…: Heb. be bitter in weeping

footnotes.body_text: ▼ weep…: Heb. be bitter in weeping
footnotes.body_html: ▼ weep…: Heb. be bitter in weeping

verses.text_plain: For it is a day of trouble, and of treading down, and of perplexity by the Lord God of hosts in the valley of vision, breaking down the walls, and of crying to the mountains.
verses.verse_html: 5For it is a day of trouble, and of treading down, and of perplexity by the Lord God of hosts in the valley of vision, breaking down the walls, and of crying to the mountains.

verses.text_plain: And Elam bare the quiver with chariots of men and horsemen, and Kir uncovered the shield.
verses.verse_html:
6And Elam bare the quiver with chariots of men and horsemen, and Kir uncovered the shield. ▼
▼ uncovered: Heb. made naked

footnotes.body_html: ▼ uncovered: Heb. made naked

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that thy choicest valleys shall be full of chariots, and the horsemen shall set themselves in array at the gate.
verses.verse_html:
7And it shall come to pass, that thy choicest valleys shall be full of chariots, and the horsemen shall set themselves in array at the gate. ▼
▼ thy…: Heb. the choice of thy valleys
 , ▼
▼ at: or, toward

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thy…: Heb. the choice of thy valleys
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thy…: Heb. the choice of thy valleys

verses.text_plain: And he discovered the covering of Judah, and thou didst look in that day to the armour of the house of the forest.
verses.verse_html: 8And he discovered the covering of Judah, and thou didst look in that day to the armour of the house of the forest.

verses.text_plain: Ye have seen also the breaches of the city of David, that they are many: and ye gathered together the waters of the lower pool.
verses.verse_html: 9Ye have seen also the breaches of the city of David, that they are many: and ye gathered together the waters of the lower pool.

verses.text_plain: And ye have numbered the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses have ye broken down to fortify the wall.
verses.verse_html: 10And ye have numbered the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses have ye broken down to fortify the wall.

verses.text_plain: Ye made also a ditch between the two walls for the water of the old pool: but ye have not looked unto the maker thereof, neither had respect unto him that fashioned it long ago.
verses.verse_html: 11Ye made also a ditch between the two walls for the water of the old pool: but ye have not looked unto the maker thereof, neither had respect unto him that fashioned it long ago.

verses.text_plain: And in that day did the Lord God of hosts call to weeping, and to mourning, and to baldness, and to girding with sackcloth:
verses.verse_html: 12And in that day did the Lord God of hosts call to weeping, and to mourning, and to baldness, and to girding with sackcloth:

verses.text_plain: And behold joy and gladness, slaying oxen, and killing sheep, eating flesh, and drinking wine: let us eat and drink; for to morrow we shall die.
verses.verse_html: 13And behold joy and gladness, slaying oxen, and killing sheep, eating flesh, and drinking wine: let us eat and drink; for to morrow we shall die.

verses.text_plain: And it was revealed in mine ears by the Lord of hosts, Surely this iniquity shall not be purged from you till ye die, saith the Lord God of hosts.
verses.verse_html: 14And it was revealed in mine ears by the Lord of hosts, Surely this iniquity shall not be purged from you till ye die, saith the Lord God of hosts.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God of hosts, Go, get thee unto this treasurer, even unto Shebna, which is over the house, and say,
verses.verse_html: 15Thus saith the Lord God of hosts, Go, get thee unto this treasurer, even unto Shebna, which is over the house, and say,

verses.text_plain: What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here, that thou hast hewed thee out a sepulchre here, as he that heweth him out a sepulchre on high, and that graveth an habitation for himself in a rock?
verses.verse_html:
16What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here, that thou hast hewed thee out a sepulchre here, as he that heweth him out a sepulchre on high, and that graveth an habitation for himself in a rock? ▼
▼ as…: or, O he

tokens.text: What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here, that thou hast hewed thee out

footnotes.body_html: ▼ as…: or, O he

verses.text_plain: Behold, the Lord will carry thee away with a mighty captivity, and will surely cover thee.
verses.verse_html:
17Behold, the Lord will carry thee away with a mighty captivity, and will surely cover thee. ▼
▼ will carry…: or, who covered thee with an excellent covering, and clothed thee gorgeously, (next verse) shall surely, etc
 , ▼
▼ a mighty…: Heb. the captivity of a man

footnotes.body_text: ▼ will carry…: or, who covered thee with an excellent covering, and clothed thee gorgeously, (next verse) shall surely, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ will carry…: or, who covered thee with an excellent covering, and clothed thee gorgeously, (next verse) shall surely, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a mighty…: Heb. the captivity of a man
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a mighty…: Heb. the captivity of a man

verses.text_plain: He will surely violently turn and toss thee like a ball into a large country: there shalt thou die, and there the chariots of thy glory shall be the shame of thy lord’s house.
verses.verse_html:
18He will surely violently turn and toss thee like a ball into a large country: there shalt thou die, and there the chariots of thy glory shall be the shame of thy lord’s house. ▼
▼ large: Heb. large of spaces

footnotes.body_html: ▼ large: Heb. large of spaces

verses.text_plain: And I will drive thee from thy station, and from thy state shall he pull thee down.
verses.verse_html: 19And I will drive thee from thy station, and from thy state shall he pull thee down.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will call my servant Eliakim the son of Hilkiah:
verses.verse_html: 20And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will call my servant Eliakim the son of Hilkiah:

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: And I will clothe him with thy robe, and strengthen him with thy girdle, and I will commit thy government into his hand: and he shall be a father to the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and to the house of Judah.
verses.verse_html: 21And I will clothe him with thy robe, and strengthen him with thy girdle, and I will commit thy government into his hand: and he shall be a father to the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and to the house of Judah.

tokens.text: and he shall be a father

verses.text_plain: And the key of the house of David will I lay upon his shoulder; so he shall open, and none shall shut; and he shall shut, and none shall open.
verses.verse_html: 22And the key of the house of David will I lay upon his shoulder; so he shall open, and none shall shut; and he shall shut, and none shall open.

verses.text_plain: And I will fasten him as a nail in a sure place; and he shall be for a glorious throne to his father’s house.
verses.verse_html: 23And I will fasten him as a nail in a sure place; and he shall be for a glorious throne to his father’s house.

tokens.text: and he shall be for a glorious

verses.text_plain: And they shall hang upon him all the glory of his father’s house, the offspring and the issue, all vessels of small quantity, from the vessels of cups, even to all the vessels of flagons.
verses.verse_html:
24And they shall hang upon him all the glory of his father’s house, the offspring and the issue, all vessels of small quantity, from the vessels of cups, even to all the vessels of flagons. ▼
▼ vessels of flagons: or, instruments of viols

footnotes.body_text: ▼ vessels of flagons: or, instruments of viols
footnotes.body_html: ▼ vessels of flagons: or, instruments of viols

verses.text_plain: In that day, saith the Lord of hosts, shall the nail that is fastened in the sure place be removed, and be cut down, and fall; and the burden that was upon it shall be cut off: for the Lord hath spoken it.
verses.verse_html: 25In that day, saith the Lord of hosts, shall the nail that is fastened in the sure place be removed, and be cut down, and fall; and the burden that was upon it shall be cut off: for the Lord hath spoken it.

tokens.text: upon it shall be cut off
